body_html:
TensorFlow team will not work on this, as we decided to limit our official support to 3.0 and later.
Older GPUs do not bring as much speed to justify the effort and added complexity required.
You can try yourself, or try to sync with other users through stackoverflow.

body:
TensorFlow team will not work on this, as we decided to limit our official support to 3.0 and later.
Older GPUs do not bring as much speed to justify the effort and added complexity required.
You can try yourself, or try to sync with other users through stackoverflow.
